Nevertheless <S%G235><s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> that <S%G3870>comforteth<s%> those that are cast <S%G5011>down,<s%> <S%G3870>comforted<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3952>coming<s%> of <S%G5103>Titus;<s%>

Now <S%G3568><s%> I <S%G5463>rejoice,<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> ye were made <S%G3076>sorry,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> ye <S%G3076>sorrowed<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3341>repentance:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> ye were made <S%G3076>sorry<s%> after a godly <S%G2596>manner,<s%> <S%G2316><s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> ye might receive <S%G2210>damage<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> <S%G2257>us<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3367>nothing.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G2596>godly<s%> <S%G2316><s%> <S%G3077>sorrow<s%> <S%G2716>worketh<s%> <S%G3341>repentance<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G4991>salvation<s%> not to be repented <S%G278>of:<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3077>sorrow<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G2716>worketh<s%> <S%G2288>death.<s%>
